description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 17 February 2023 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Pallet Racking for two new DND locations that require shelving for the storage of goods. All the deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Project Title (English/French)**: W6795-23BM09 - Pallet Racking /W6795-23BM09 - Rayonage à palettes

**Reference Number (Numéro de Référence)**: WS3776536588-Doc3827720771
**Amendment Number (Numéro de Modification)**: 1
**Solicitation Number (Numéro de Sollicitation)**: WS3776536588
**Publication Date (Date de Publication)**: January 15, 2023
**Closing Date (Date de Clôture)**: February 17, 2023 (14:00 EST)

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date (Date de début prévue)**: February 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date (Date de fin prévue)**: May 31, 2023

**Tender Status (Statut de la demande d'offres)**: Cancelled / Annulé

**Notice Type (Type d'avis)**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Procurement Method (Méthode d'approvisionnement)**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Selection Criteria (Critères de sélection)**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux)**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / *Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Regions of Opportunity (Régions d'opportunités)**: None / Aucune

**Regions of Delivery (Régions de livraison)**: *Ontario (except NCR) / *Ontario (sauf RCN)

**Contracting Entity (Entité contractante)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

*   *Address (Adresse)*: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage (Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5)
*   *Contact Information (Informations de contact)*: Kathleen (SPAC/PSPC) kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca



**Project Description (Description du projet)**

  The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of Pallet Racking for two new DND locations.
